facts.text: I can puff up to twice my size! When I'm scared, I swallow water super fast to become a big spiky ball.
I have a secret weapon called tetrodotoxin - it's one of the most powerful poisons in nature! It keeps predators away.
I don't have scales like other fish. Instead, I have thick, rough skin that's really tough!
My teeth never stop growing! They're fused together like a beak, and I use them to crack open shellfish and coral.
Some of my relatives are artists! Male pufferfish create beautiful circular patterns in the sand to attract females.

profile.habitat: Tropical and subtropical ocean waters worldwide
profile.size: 1 inch to 2 feet depending on species
